name: CC Rally - a rally game made in coppercube game engine.
name_original: CC Rally - a rally game made in coppercube game engine.
description:
An off-road rally game with 3 cars, 2 maps, day and night cycle.

Made in a week.

Please consider donating.

You can get the source file for 1 dollar. 

There is also a low-end version.
